code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{observer}from"mobx-react-lite";import{Context}from"../index";import{Button,Col,Image,Row}from"react-bootstrap";import OneItemInBasket from"../components/oneItemInBasket";import emptyBasket from"./../assets/emptyBasket.jpg";import{ORDERING_ROUTE}from"../utils/consts";import{NavLink}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BasketCard=observer(()=>{const{basket}=useContext(Context);if(basket.Basket.length===0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex flex-column align-items-center mt-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Image,{src:emptyBasket}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-center mt-5",style:{fontSize:28},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("b",{children:"Empty shopping basket"})})]});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:ORDERING_ROUTE,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{children:"Checkout"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{className:"mt-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{xs:12,children:basket.Basket.map(device=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(OneItemInBasket,{device:device},device.id))})})]});});export default BasketCard;
